column15: Buy original GAS DENIM-A-28 at best price in India. Read its features  reviews and specifications. Get fast & assured delivery all over India.
column17:
Gas Blue Men Denims - A-28:
Make a style statement where ever you go with this pair of blue denims from Gas. This pair of denims though simple in looks score high on style. The quality fabric used for the make of this pair of denims makes it comfortable to wear. Team up this pair of washed-style denims with a graphic print T-shirt to get a perfect casual look or with a checkered shirt to get a semi-formal look.
